info.name: Puckurt Tumblr Dashboard
info.additionalInfo:
If you see that the background is in every page, and you're using Chrome, then click on the Stylish icon on the right of your browser - right click - then click on "options" and then on "Puckurt Tumblr Dashboard" chose "Edit". 

Find the "Applies to" and chose from the menu "URLs starting with" and then type "www.tumblr.com"
